pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, October 11, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, October 11, 2017:

Washington, United States of America

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, Ms. Grégoire Trudeau, and the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Chrystia Freeland, will participate in the Women One Roundtable Discussion.

Case Foundation Office
1717 Rhode Island Avenue, NW

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Chrystia Freeland, will meet with the Committee on Ways and Means.

Longworth House Office Building
Capitol Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive at the White House and be greeted by the Honorable Donald Trump, President of the United States of America, and the First Lady of the United States of America, Melania Trump.

South Portico Entrance
White House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:55 p.m. The Prime Minister, Ms. Grégoire Trudeau, the President and the First Lady of the United States of America will participate in a photo opportunity.

Oval Office, West Wing
White House

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a tête-a-tête meeting with the President of the United States of America followed by an expanded bilateral meeting.

White House

Note for media:

  • Closed to media

3:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Roof Terrace, 6th Floor
Canadian Embassy
501 Pennsylvania Ave, NW

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Note: all times local
